title: East Hollywood Studio with Outdoor Lounge + Wood Style Floors
posting_body: ['Very charming studio inside a Beautiful Old Hollywood-style building.', 'Located right off Fountain, walking distance from many restaurants and shops.', 'Less than a 5-minute drive to Silver Lake, Los Feliz, and Virgil Village.', 'There is only 1 apartment available.', 'The exposed brick wall makes this one a gem!', '\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200bYou also have access to a common area w/ BBQ — host the dinner party of your dreams, under charming string lights.', 'Other amenities include Bike storage and in-building laundry.', 'Come see it today.', '1172 North New Hampshire Avenue Los Angeles, CA', 'Amenities:', 'Vinyl Plank Flooring', 'Outdoor Lounge', 'Laundry On-Site', 'Controlled Access', 'Bike Storage', 'Refrigerator', 'Outdoor BBQ', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Gas Range', 'Microwave', 'Phone Us at', 'show contact info', 'For more property photos, floor plans and further details visit : <URL>/', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Restrictions apply.', 'Call for details.']
